EmailTemplate.name: Palmetto Cloud App Steps To Download
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Palmetto Cloud Solar Monitoring & Usage Is Ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
This is {!User.FirstName}, your dedicated customer care representative we are excited to inform you that your full access to the Palmetto Cloud Account is ready!
We just need you to follow these simple steps to setup your new Palmetto Cloud Account.
1) Delete the old "Palmetto" app off of your smartphone
2) You will receive and email from Palmetto that contains a link that you must click and follow.
3) After clicking that link you will be directed to the App store, where you will download the NEW Palmetto App.
*Please DO NOT go directly to the App store to download the newPalmetto App.
*You have to open the email to link your solar system to the new Palmetto APP
4) After the app is downloaded, you can setup your new login information on your smartphone.
Please call our Customer Care Dept. if you have any further questions about this process.
Thank You,
{!User.FirstName} Palmetto Customer Care Dept. Direct: 855-339-1831 Office: 843-720-1844 customer.care@palmetto.com
